alert.note: Alert for Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 09 at 1:03AM MST until December 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Lake Mead National Recreation Area, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave, Eastern Mojave Desert, Cadiz Basin, San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley, and Southern Clark County. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Choppy waters and large waves will occur on area lakes. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Unsecured objects will be blown around.
info.instruction: Use extra caution if driving high profile vehicles or motorcycles. Boaters should avoid the open waters or postpone outings until winds subside. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area
